commit_list.message:
Cleanup the nginx / unicorn documentation

*  Removed the un-needed `-l` argument to unicorn when starting the
   server.
*  Added a more graceful, cleaner way to stop unicorn as a first
   resort rather than going straight to kill -9.

gpgr is a lightweight wrapper around the GNU Privacy Guard's command line interface. Its primary concern is in quickly encrypting files  easily from within Ruby. It also offers very limited key-management functionality. The original saved encrypted files to disk and this fork gets around that by passing a stream around.

gpgr is a lightweight wrapper around the GNU Privacy Guard's command line interface. Its primary concern is in quickly encrypting files  easily from within Ruby. It also offers very limited key-management functionality

Ever wondered how many pizzas you need to order to feed your team? Well, question no more! How Many Pizzas answers one simple question.
Jobby is a small utility and library for managing and running jobs in concurrent processes.
Jobby Rails is a rails interface to the Jobby gem. Use it to efficiently handle the background running of long tasks in Rails.

Prawn::Graph adds straightforward native graph drawing to Prawn without the need to depend on anything else. All generated graphs are pure PDF Vector Images. It results in smaller document sizes and less complication.

rack-security provides middleware to help protect your application against common security issues such as SQL Injection and null-byte attacks
